message: Would be nice if I could click a button and go to the next unread thing. bonus points for keyboard shortcut.
highlighting over group tab, then selecting, then clicking, and typing and doing it all over is timeconsuming.
We've definitely thought about something like this.  Personally, I like the way Quora does it.
They have notifications for what you've missed, and then when you click on one, they put a bar at the top of the screen with previous and next
